name: International Fragrance Association
goal: About us: IFRA is the worldwide trade association representing the interests of “fragrance houses”, creators, innovators and manufacturers of fragrance compositions and fragrance materials to scent namely household and personal care products, as well as fine fragrances marketed by the downstream companies.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives:
IFRA Strives to present balanced and fact based policies relating to chemical/ingredient safety.

These policy positions are generally risk based aiming for appropriate and proportionate legislative frameworks.

IFRA is actively engaged in fostering EU business development by providing a legal framework in which
the protection of know how is a key element.
